page.title: 18RECREATION-EAST DONCASTER
page.content: {1.GOLF COURSES:}Town Moor golf course (GR6002)is 6103 yards long but the Wheatley course(GR6004)is longer at 6169 yards.Town Moor course,first used in 1894, is open from 8am till dusk. Wheatley course,Doncaster's first golf course is open from 8 a.m. to 8pm. {Fees:}Town Moor:Men Â£200,Women Â£180, Juniors Â£90. Wheatley:Men Â£272,Women Â£194, Juniors Â£68. You can become a member at 11.{Number of members:}Town Moor:Men 400, Women 380,Juniors 70. Wheatley:Men 380,Women 200,Juniors 70. {2.DONCASTER RUGBY UNION CLUB(613045): A thriving junior rugby club,they have wide ranging fixtures at all levels from 1st XV to under 15yrs.Mini-rugby, played on Sundays,is very successful. Recent floodlighting and drainage have improved playing conditions. {3.RACE COURSE:}Town Moor Course,home of the oldest classic,the St.Leger.
